snippet: Yovani Gallardo gave the Milwaukee Brewers what they needed heading into a big week against division rivals.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Milwaukee Brewers defeat Pittsburgh Pirates, 4-1; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Yovani Gallardo gave the Milwaukee Brewers what they needed heading into a big week against division rivals.

headline.seo: Gallardo Strikes Out 14 in Win Over Pirates
headline.main: Brewers’ Gallardo Strikes Out 14 in Win
headline.print_headline: Brewers’ Gallardo Strikes Out 14 in Win
